resources.string: When using this app, please use one of your hand to hold the phone, and touch the phone screen with any finger of the other hand. Please do activities in a relaxed pace, since we are not in a race!
In this activity, some small circles will be presented on screen in sequence. please touch the center of the circle to destroy it!
In this activity, an icon will be shown to you, please remember this icon and click continue. Then find the icon among others and touch it!
In this activity, a sentence will be shown to you, and you need to type the sentence following the case and punctuation, then click submit!
